title: Delicious Things Are Meant to Be Exchanged
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>*huff huff*.... Rin-chan, the ramen you recommended is delicious~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Isn’t it!? Rin found this place recently~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Are you going to go here with the rest of μ’s?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! When Rin finds a good shop, Rin tells Kayochin first! If Kayochin also says that it’s good, then we’ll bring everyone here nya<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>*huff huff*.... *huff huff*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ruby-chan, is it hard to eat….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>No, that’s not it. Ruby was just trying to be careful not to get burned because it’s so hot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then Rin is glad. Rin will give you these. Menma and char siu and soy egg! They’re really tasty~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeh!? Then you won’t have anything left on yours, Rin-chan. Then, Ruby will give you these. Kakuni and cabbage and menma! Ah, Ruby gave you menma too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ahaha, it’s a menma exchange~! Yeah, it’s delicious nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
